meanings.definition: A festival or event showcasing films.
meanings.sent1: The filmfest featured a variety of movies from different genres.
meanings.sent2: I can't wait to attend the filmfest next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The filmfest was so popular that even the popcorn ran out!
meanings.sent4: Her backyard movie night felt like a small filmfest under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The filmfest was a colorful celebration of storytelling through cinema.

meanings.definition: To organize or attend a film festival.
meanings.sent1: She decided to filmfest in her hometown to promote local filmmakers.
meanings.sent2: We filmfest every year to appreciate the art of cinema.
meanings.sent3: Let's filmfest this weekend and watch all the new releases!
meanings.sent4: He filmfests with enthusiasm, always eager to discover new talents.
meanings.sent5: Filmfesting together creates a sense of community among movie lovers.
